来访的学生: 牛顿于 1687 年发表了万有引力理论。
visiting students: Newton published the theory of gravity in 1687.

visiting students: Edison made his first successful invention in New York.

visiting students: Nightingale spent her life taking care of/looking after the sick people.

I think he is going to be successful.

visiting students: I spend too much time watching television/TV.

visiting students: Wang Yiming is looking at a web page about famous world changers.

visiting students: Shakespeare created many characters and brought them to life.

来访的学生: 他的作品让我们笑,让我们哭,让我们思考。
